name: Frozen Costume Party
description:
♥ Play this game for free and help Anna and Elsa to dress up for them. Because Elsa and Anna, are attending a sumptuous costume party in this evening!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Good looks are more than just a nice dress and a good pair of shoes, of course! Girls need makeovers so their skin and nails are perfect. You also need to apply makeup to make them look beautiful, such as lipstick, blush, mascara and more. Help them fix their hair so they don't go out there looking like a mess!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Enjoy playing probably one of the most unique fantasy dress up games that you've ever enjoyed!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Have fun with this game!

♥ 2 princesses to choose!
♥ Style your Ice Princess with flawless makeup - choose lipsticks, eyeliners and more!
♥ Choose a gorgeous dress and complement it with accessories!
♥ You can play by turns and then compare the results!
♥ Excellent graphics and music!

http://primegalleryapp.com/category/games/casual/ - Great selection of games!
